steps.title: Keep your message family-friendly and lighthearted.
steps.content: Keep your message family-friendly and lighthearted. If you know your coworkers and boss have the same humor as you, go for a goofy or silly OOO message! Just make sure your message stays PG and is relatively lighthearted. This will help you remain professional while also being funny. Use emojis or emoticons (especially in Slack statuses) to amplify your joke and show that your message is supposed to make people smile. Avoid making fun of your job or colleagues in your message.
